resources.string:
Hi, my name is Vishal.
Indeed there is nothing fancy about a name,
put out so thoughtlessly.
So what do I tell you,
I love reading books and I love them because unlike people they stay, like an experience they season,
grow old and stay with me when I need them to. 

There is nothing wrong with people except for their uncertainity! 
The biggest issue with most people is the fact that we get attached and we do get attached pretty bad.
Is it our genetic makeup or instinct I do not know. 
I guess it hurts but so did leaving the womb,losing your favorite toy, get scolded the first day and every other thing that you can think about. 
Learn to make peace! 


Every person is as sad and as sulky.
